Event.Message:
Windows has started processing the volume mount request.
Volume GUID: %1 Volume Name: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The volume has been successfully mounted.
Volume GUID: %1 Volume Name: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Windows failed to mount the volume.
Status: %4 Volume GUID: %1 Volume Name: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Windows is configured to block legacy file system filters.
Filter name: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FilterNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="FilterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FilterNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Legacy file system filters cannot attach to byte addressable volumes.
Filter name: %2 Volume name: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FilterNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="FilterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="FilterNameLength"/> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dumps are disabled on the machine since there was an error enabling dump encryption: %1. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=824149 for more information on dump encryption
